scripts.build:browser:full: npm run build:browser:app && npm run build:browser:ui
scripts.build:browser:app: mkdir -p dist && browserify src/app/index.js --standalone app -p [ tsify ] > dist/app.js && uglifyjs dist/app.js --compress --mangle > dist/app.min.js
scripts.build:browser:ui: mkdir -p dist && browserify src/ui/index.js --standalone app -p [ tsify ] -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env @babel/preset-react ] --plugins [ @babel/plugin-transform-class-properties ] ] > dist/ui.js && uglifyjs dist/ui.js --compress --mangle > dist/ui.min.js
